name: Getaway to BREATH TAKING beaches in a historical city in Brazil! Beaches, waterfalls, mangroove, good music, art in Rio's green coast!!
description: Join the magical part of Rio, different from the craziness of the big and mainstream Rio! Get in touch with the nature and relax in a place where you can find beautiful beaches, breath taking waterfalls, cachaças destilleries, good music and the brazilian hospitality.
